issue.body:

comment.body:
Https flitering is on for me. What else?

On Mon, Mar 11, 2024, 10:14 PM jellizaveta ***@***.***> wrote:

> Most likely https filtering is turned off for tor browser by default. Tor
> does not trust third-party security certificates.
>
> —
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/174461#issuecomment-1988543786>,
> or unsubscribe

> .

issue.title: pikabu.ru & фильтры для adguard 2.12.250

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [ ] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [ ] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

2.12.250

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed ads or ad leftovers

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://pikabu.ru

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

_No response_

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

AdGuard Russian filter, RU AdList - Counters

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. Есть старый смарт на 4.2 с adguard 2.12.250 (как оно там работает - отдельная история, речь не про это), где новые фильтры уже не катят. Можно ли какими-то костылями там заблокировать рекламу ? Сам ресурс, что характерно, грузится быстро, но прогружающиеся постфактум рекламные блоки могут намертво повесить браузер, пока прогружаются. За точность указанного списка фильтров не ручаюсь, но используются подписки *_optimized.txt под индексами 1 - 4, 11, 14, 15 

2. Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![SNAGIT_2024 03 07_17 23 14](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/assets/12525093/e15334ff-aaf8-47e0-9356-79dcb3e8c069)

</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.body:
